narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Christabel, LLC is a Nursing Care provider based in Cedar Hill, TX. From 2023-02 through 2024-12, this provider received $1.0M in Medicaid payments across 10K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 2.0× the national median for H2019 (H2019), at $170 per claim vs. the median of $84, placing them above the 75th percentile.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $1.0M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
